text: God gumazamizibar arazir kuraba bagh me tuisɨghamin dughiam akɨrigha gɨfa. An arazir aghuimɨn mɨrara, a inabazir gumazim nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba tuisɨgham. Gumazir kam aremezɨ God a gamizɨma a ua dɨkafi. Bizir kamɨn God e tuisɨghamin ingangarim gumazamiziba bar men akazɨ, me fo, a guizbangɨra otogham.”
